meanings.definition: The act of formally inducting someone into office.
meanings.sent1: The school's inauguration of the new principal was a grand event.
meanings.sent2: The inauguration of the new president drew a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: At the inauguration, the mayor accidentally tripped on the stage.
meanings.sent4: The inauguration of the CEO marked a new era for the company.
meanings.sent5: The inauguration ceremony was filled with pomp and circumstance.

meanings.definition: The formal beginning or introduction of something.
meanings.sent1: The inauguration of the concert was delayed due to technical issues.
meanings.sent2: The inauguration of the project signaled a fresh start for the team.
meanings.sent3: The inauguration of the cake cutting ceremony brought smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The inauguration of the book club sparked a love for reading in the community.
meanings.sent5: The inauguration of the art exhibition showcased talented local artists.
